metadata.title: CVE-2019-10871 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Poppler 0.74.0. There is a heap-based bufferover-read in the function PSOutputDev::checkPageSlice at PSOutputDev.cc.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10871` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.86.1-0ubuntu1
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.86.1-0ubuntu1
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.86.1-0ubuntu1
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.86.1-0ubuntu1
libpoppler97 - 0.86.1-0ubuntu1
poppler-utils - 0.86.1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.86.1-0ubuntu1').
